I found O'Toxo to be the quintessential tapas bar for Barcelona.  The place seemed to be a neighborhood restuarant for locals.  The service was excellent (as most places in Barcelona neighborhoods) and food was diverse, catalan staples, and served fresh.  The wine options were great too.  Overall great ambiance when in the Raval.   Came here twice during my visit to Barcelona and was the best Tapas bar I came across during my visit to Spain.  Can't wait to go back.
